thread.title: Getty Realty Corp. Announces Regular Quarterly Cash Dividend

author: cnbc.com
title: Getty Realty Corp. Announces Regular Quarterly Cash Dividend
text:
JERICHO, N.Y.--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- Getty Realty Corp. (NYSE:GTY) announced today that its Board of Directors declared a cash dividend of $0.32 per common share payable on July 5, 2018, to holders of record on June 21, 2018.
About Getty Realty Corp .
Getty Realty Corp. is the leading publicly-traded real estate investment trust in the United States specializing in the ownership, leasing and financing of convenience store and gasoline station properties. As of March 31, 2018, the Company owned 824 properties and leased 78 properties from third-party landlords in 28 states across the United States and Washington, D.C.
View source version on businesswire.com : https://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20180508006750/en/
